Filter Products productDispatch({ type: "SORT_BY_PRICE", payload: "lowToHigh", })} checked = {ort === "lowToHigh" ? true : false} /> productDispatch({ type: "SORT_BY_PRICE", payload: "highToLow", })} checked = {sort === "highToLow" ? true : false} /> productDispatch({ type: "FILTER_BY_RATING", payload: i + 1 , })} style={{ cursor: "pointer"}} />
) } export default Filters
